# RunProgramOptions.Default property

Gets a value that contains the default values. The shell must be used when starting the process and there is no delay time.

```csharp
public static RunProgramOptions Default { get; }
```

## Return Value

A [`RunProgramOptions`](../RunProgramOptions.md) reference that contains the default values.
